title.en: Prayer to Jamyang Khyentse Chökyi Lodrö

text.en: The actual embodiment of all the victorious buddhas of the three times
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa malü düpé ngö

text.en: And sole refuge for the teachings and beings of this degenerate age was Khyentse Wangpo.
text.en-trans: nyikdü ten drö kyab chik khyentsé wang

text.en: Manifestation of his supreme blessings and compassion,
text.en-trans: chok gi jinlab tukjé nampar rol

text.en: Jamyang Chökyi Lodrö, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: jamyang chökyi lodrö la solwa deb

text.en: Cause my own and other beings’ minds to turn towards the Dharma,
text.en-trans: dak sok drowé lona chö la gyur

text.en: And inspire me to encounter my own true face, the natural state!
text.en-trans: neluk rang zhal jalwar jingyi lob

text.en: Unstained by any objects perceived as external,
text.en-trans: chirol zungwé yul gyi ma gö shing

text.en: And unspoilt by any inner perceiving thoughts—
Sustaining an uncontrived experience of settled meditation,
May the dharmatā condition of my own mind nakedly arise!
This is the wisdom intent of all the buddhas.
text.en-trans: di ni sangye kün gyi gongpa té

text.en: Through the profound practice of decisive contentment,
text.en-trans: tak ché lo dé nyamlen zabmo yi

text.en: Inspire me to realize the three kāyas of my own awareness
text.en-trans: rangrig ku sum gongpa ngöngyur té

text.en: And to empty saṃsāra from its very depths!
text.en-trans: khorwa dong né trukpar jingyi lob
